section.title: JHotDraw 8
section.para: JHotDraw 8 is a complete rewrite of the JHotDraw 7 framework. It is not compatible with prior versions of the framework.

listitem.para: Provides an application framework for document-based applications

A figure, which depends on the state of other figures, does not automatically update its state. State dependencies are public. Update strategies for dependent states are implemented in drawing models.
The code makes use of Java 8 language features and the Java 8 SE API.
The framework is built on top of the JavaFX class library and its design principles.

section.para: JHotDraw 8 was developed by Werner Randelshofer.
